title: San Diego/Balboa Park-Hillcrest
name: Marston House
hours: Summer: Th-M 10AM-5PM, tours every half hour; Winter: F-M 10AM-4PM, tours every half hour
price: $10 adults, $7 seniors/students/military, $4 youth, free for children under 6
content: Operated by the San Diego Historical Society, this historic residence is open for guided tours.
